definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: We have bacon and milk for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我們早餐有醃豬肉和牛奶。

sentences.english: I marinate the pork with different seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 我用了不同的調味料來醃豬肉片。

sentences.english: She likes to lard the chicken with some bacon.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡在雞肉里加點醃豬肉。
